channel.title: codeigniter on Fatkun's Blog

item.title: codeigniter数据库错误信息获取
item.description: db_debug – TRUE/FALSE (boolean) – Whether database errors should be displayed. 需要设置db_debug = false Yes, this is the mysql_error() wrapper. $this->db->_error_message(); And the mysql_errno wrapper is: $this->db->_error_number(); via: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3234564/under-codeigniter-is-it-possible-to-see-mysql-error
